entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:06 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:06 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
